titles.title: Indian Community Economic Enhancement Act of 2017
Indian Economic Enhancement Act of 2017

A bill to amend the Native American Business Development, Trade Promotion, and Tourism Act of 2000, the Buy Indian Act, and the Native American Programs Act of 1974 to provide industry and economic development opportunities to Indian communities.
Indian Economic Enhancement Act of 2017

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Indian Affairs.

calendar.text: Committee on Indian Affairs. Ordered to be reported with an amendment favorably.
